attributes.action: Lewis Hamilton should not be knighted
attributes.additional_details: The committee consists of the chairs of the specialist honours committees, the Permanent Secretary of the Foreign and Commonwealth Office, the Chief of Defence Staff and another Permanent Secretary should give the funding to the NHS or honoured instead of Lewis
attributes.background:
Some more deserving people deserve to be knighted than Lewis
The designers, mechanics & strategists should be before a selfish narcissist
